channel.title: Half Life Source and 2 acts Weird
channel.description:
I got this Problem, HL:S has THis Background Glitch heres the link for the Evidence. [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u6WM57h_E64[/url]
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rqKsOn9wWAI[/url] this same thing happens with Half life 2 on my laptop.
I tried all Graphic settings. nothing worked. it only works if you look at the walls or the floor. anyone knows the answer?
(updated) Sorry guys, i was trying to watch Akira and post this that i forgot that i was posting the lnk to the real video
So i Apoligize if i posted the wrong link.

item.title: Half Life Source and 2 acts Weird
item.dc:creator: Lamarsmaster
item.description:
if you were defending me then thank you.
if not, then Your terrible.
Also, i never actually thought about upgrading the graphics, i mean i once Bought half life in the store and it worked pretty well so then i thought, source could work on this. but then i was wrong and was scarred by this since it happened.

So the main reason i DL’ed HL Source is because i couldn’t find it on the store and i didn’t have an money. so that’s it. full explanation right there.

item.description:
I’m sure that’s a problem with the .vmt’s/.vtf’s, which are the games texture files. Re-Install both games and/or verify the games cache, and then try.

In your second video you said in the comments you downloaded it from taringa.net, which is clearly a pirating website. Go fuck yourself
